available_tools.name: AESEventQueue
available_tools.description: Receives account events from AES SNS topic and triggers AESEventHandler Lambda for processing, if Lambda returns false then put event in DLQ

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The account ID associated with the event

parameters.name: Timestamp
parameters.description: The time the account event occurred

parameters.name: EventId
parameters.description: The event ID

available_tools.name: AESEventDLQ
available_tools.description: Receives failed account events and stores them for later analysis

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The account ID associated with the event

parameters.name: Timestamp
parameters.description: The time the account event occurred

parameters.name: EventId
parameters.description: The event ID

available_tools.name: AESEventHandler
available_tools.description: Processes account events received from AESEventQueue

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The account ID associated with the event

parameters.name: Timestamp
parameters.description: The time the account event occurred

parameters.name: EventId
parameters.description: The event ID

return.description: Whether the event was successfully handled

available_tools.name: AccountStatusTable_Read
available_tools.description: Reads the current status of accounts

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The account ID to read the status for

return.description: The current status of the account

available_tools.name: AccountStatusTable_Write
available_tools.description: Writes the current status of accounts

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The account ID to write the status for

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: The new status of the account

available_tools.name: TransformControlPlane_ListProfilesByAccountId
available_tools.description: Lists all user profiles in the system

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The account ID to list profiles for

available_tools.name: TransformControlPlane_CleanupProfile
available_tools.description: Cleans up user profiles in the system

parameters.name: ProfileArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the profile to clean up

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The account ID associated with the event

parameters.name: Timestamp
parameters.description: The time the account event occurred

parameters.name: EventId
parameters.description: The event ID

return.description: The type of the account event, or EXPIRED if the event is no longer valid

available_tools.name: AccountEventsService_AcknowledgeAccountEvent
available_tools.description: Acknowledges account events with response code

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The account ID associated with the event

parameters.name: Timestamp
parameters.description: The time the account event occurred

parameters.name: EventId
parameters.description: The event ID

parameters.name: ResponseCode
parameters.description: The response code for the acknowledgment
